summary: A collection of miscellaneous helper utilities and a ROUTINES class that abstracts MAPDL (ANSYS Mechanical APDL) routine interfaces, providing decorators, validation checks, temporary file handling, threading helpers, and other generic functions to support MAPDL command execution.
business_intent: Enable the ANSYS MAPDL Python API to perform routine operations, validation, and auxiliary tasks in a consistent and reusable manner, simplifying interaction with MAPDL and improving code maintainability.
